short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks GitHub SSO login links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"With this extension manually clicking SSO sign in links in github is a thing of the past!"

Whenever a GitHub page is loaded an attempt is made to discover whether there are any SSO login links. Then this extension automatically hits the link for you! If you are taken to the click 'continue' to login screen, that too is clicked.

Features:
✅ Autoclick the 'Continue' button when navigating to a GitHub SSO login link or autodirected to a SSO login continue page after token expiry.
✅ Autoclick the 'Single sign-on' button link when navigating to a PR page after SSO has timed out
